summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RevOps Garage Management System MVP. Backend API testing achieved 89.5% success rate with all core functionality working. Frontend testing revealed authentication integration issues preventing full end-to-end workflow testing.

minor_issues.issue: Network timeouts during role restriction testing

authentication_issues.issue: Login requests failing with 401 errors despite backend API working independently

ui_bugs.issue: Owner registration redirects to dashboard instead of workshop setup page

integration_issues.issue: JWT token handling or CORS issues preventing successful login from frontend

passed_tests: Invite code generation via backend API
Payment recording and confirmation via backend API
Job status updates via backend API
Analytics dashboard data via backend API
PDF document generation (job cards and invoices)
Managers list retrieval via backend API

success_percentage.frontend: 60% - Core UI loads but authentication integration failing

critical_fixes: Fix frontend-backend authentication integration - login API calls returning 401
Investigate CORS configuration or JWT token handling between frontend and backend
Verify AuthContext implementation and token storage/transmission
medium_priority: Fix registration workflow routing (owner should go to workshop setup if no workshop exists)
Improve error handling and user feedback for failed authentication attempts
testing_notes: All backend APIs are functional and working correctly when tested directly
Frontend UI components render properly and navigation works
The issue appears to be in the integration layer between frontend and backend authentication
